name: Series2Graph++
full_name: Distributed Detection of Correlation Anomalies in Multivariate Time Series
paper: Series2Graph++: Distributed Detection of Correlation Anomalies in Multivariate Time Series. DaWaK
description: Series2Graph++ is an extension of Series2Graph for multivariate time series. More generally, it is a graph-based anomaly detection algorithm for time series that transforms subsequences into nodes and their transition patterns into edges. The frequency of transitions among types of subsequences is encoded in a directed graph. Anomalies are identified based on irregular transition patterns.
bibtex: @article{boniol2020series2graph, title={Series2Graph: Graph-based Subsequence Anomaly Detection for Time Series}, author={Boniol, Paul and Palpanas, Themis}, journal={Proc. VLDB Endow.}, volume={13}, number={12}, pages={1921--1934}, year={2020}}
